ygData.subject: Re: What are YOU wearing
ygData.msgSnippet: Earrings:golden amber(3 str),sapphire electrum earring(4str,2int) Neck:golden opal amulet(9sta,6agi) Face:platinum ruby veil(7str,7wis) Head:fine silk
ygData.messageBody:
Earrings:golden amber(3 str),sapphire electrum earring(4str,2int)
Neck:golden opal amulet(9sta,6agi)
Face:platinum ruby veil(7str,7wis)
Head:fine silk turbin(10ac,wt0.3,10svfire)
Rings:jagged bands(3str,5ac)
Wrist:bracer of erollisi(5str,5ac),serpentine bracer(ac1,9agi,3dex)-soon to
be silver plated bracer(7ac,7sv disease and poison)
Arms:cured silk
Hands:wus fighting guantlets
Mantle:cured silk
Legs:drake-hide leggings(5dex,5cha)
Feet:cured silk
Tunic:foremans(3str,3wis)
Back:cured silk
Waste:purity belt(2str,2sta,?ac)
-I know this isnt the best of the best for my lvl, but i am currently
working on getting it updated. Might start wearing collar of undead
protection(5ac,?sv poison disease),treant fists(8ac,3dex,5hp),azure
sleeves(12ac,wt is real low), and fixing to switch to thick leather apron
for ac.

-Aeleon Leonheart fo the Ashen Order
Level 31
Innoruuk Server
